title: Stuck in Endless reconnect loop.
body:
Some few minutes ago I finished a match and the game was in the process of loading the match results page. It was taking a while loading so I just quit out of it and went off to something else. 

When I came back looking to keep playing, when I logged in it came up with a message saying "Game Abandoned. You have left a game in progress. Please reconnect to the game." The game doesnt exist to reconnect too because i didnt abandon it. We just lost. 

When i click reconnect (hoping it would realise its mistake and send me to the match results page) it just sits on a black screen failing to load anything. When i force quit the app and re-log it just comes up with the same message. 

I am now stuck in an endless loop of reconnect screen :( pls help

replies.body: Ghost games 2spooky. This is a server side problem. There is literally nothing you can do about it.
